welcome_message.text:
👋 Welcome to HELB Virtual Assistant!
How can I help you today?

1. 🎓 Apply for a HELB Loan
2. 💰 Loan Repayment
3. 📄 Check Loan Status
4. 🔁 Update Personal Details
5. 📝 Compliance/Statement Request
6. 📚 FAQs
7. 🧑 Talk to an Agent

Reply with a number (e.g., 1)

1.text:
🎓 Apply for HELB Loan:
- Undergraduate: https://portal.helb.co.ke/auth/signin
- TVET Loans: https://www.helb.co.ke/tvet-loans/
- Postgraduate: https://www.helb.co.ke/postgraduate-loans/
- First-Time Applicant Guide: https://www.helb.co.ke/how-to-apply/

📥 Download Forms:
- Undergraduate Guide (PDF): https://yourdomain.com/documents/undergraduate-guide.pdf
- TVET Loan Form (PDF): https://yourdomain.com/documents/tvet-loan-form.pdf

2.text:
💰 Loan Repayment Info:
- Repayment Methods: https://www.helb.co.ke/loan-repayment/
- Penalty Waiver Info: https://www.helb.co.ke/penalty-waiver/
- Employer Portal: https://employer.helb.co.ke/

📥 Repayment Guide (PDF): https://yourdomain.com/documents/repayment-guide.pdf

3.text: 📄 To check your loan status, log in here: https://portal.helb.co.ke/auth/signin

4.text:
🔁 Update Details:
- Change Phone/Email: Login and update: https://portal.helb.co.ke
- Update Employer Info: https://www.helb.co.ke/loan-repayment/

5.text:
📝 Compliance & Loan Statement:
- Request Compliance Certificate: https://www.helb.co.ke/compliance-certificate/
- View/Download Statement: https://portal.helb.co.ke

📥 Compliance Request Form (PDF): https://yourdomain.com/documents/compliance-request-form.pdf

6.text:
📚 FAQs:
Read answers to common questions here: https://www.helb.co.ke/faqs/

7.text: 🧑 Please describe your issue. An agent will assist you shortly.
